meanings.definition: Experiencing worry or unease about something with an uncertain outcome.
meanings.sent1: She felt anxious before the test.
meanings.sent2: The anxious student waited for the results.
meanings.sent3: The anxious squirrel kept checking if it buried its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The anxious clouds gathered, hinting at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: His anxious pacing left marks on the floor.

meanings.sent1: He was anxious to open his birthday presents.
meanings.sent2: The children were anxious for the carnival to begin.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked anxious for its favorite toy to be thrown.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed anxious to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The chef was anxious to try out his new recipe.
